description.plain: Lefteris Pantazis, who is often called by the nickname LEPA by the media and his fans, is a Greek singer. He was born on 27 March 1955 to Pontic Greek parents in Tashkent, Uzbek SSR, in the USSR. His parents repatriated to Greece as refugees in the 1960s. He began singing professionally in the mid-1970s and his first record was distributed in 1979. His songs belong to a genre that cannot precisely be described and in Greek it is called skiladiko or laika. His music combines elements of traditional country folk music and modern pop.

body.plain: Lefteris Pantazis, who is often called by the nickname LEPA by the media and his fans, is a Greek singer. He was born on 27 March 1955 to Pontic Greek parents in Tashkent, Uzbek SSR, in the USSR. His parents repatriated to Greece as refugees in the 1960s. He began singing professionally in the mid-1970s and his first record was distributed in 1979. His songs belong to a genre that cannot precisely be described and in Greek it is called skiladiko or laika. His music combines elements of traditional country folk music and modern pop.

songs.title: Kati Magiko

description.plain: After “Apisto”, the new collaboration of Lefteris Pantazis with Christodoulos Siganos and Valentino. The songs of the song were inspired by Christodoulos Siganos and Valentino while Christodoulos Siganos again took over the music.

songs.embed_content: Read “Kati Magiko” by Lefteris Pantazis on Genius

album.full_title: Eleftheros Ki Oreos by Lefteris Pantazis
album.name: Eleftheros Ki Oreos

body.plain: After “Apisto”, the new collaboration of Lefteris Pantazis with Christodoulos Siganos and Valentino. The songs of the song were inspired by Christodoulos Siganos and Valentino while Christodoulos Siganos again took over the music.

songs.lyrics:
Kati Magiko Lyrics[Intro]
Eisai sto myalo kati magiko

[Verse 1]
Opou pas esy tha 'mai panta ego
Tha s' akoloutho, den boro n' allaxo
S' echo san theo, choria sou den zo
Kai me pathos tha fonaxo

[Chorus]
Eisai sto myalo kati magiko
Otan m' akoumpas liono, liono
Eisai sto myalo kati magiko
M' ena sou fili dose pono

[Verse 2]
San mikro paidi kano otan se do
Kai otan koimitho, zeis sta oneira mou
Tha 'sai mia zoi, pos na sou to po
Karfomeni mes sti kardia mou
[Chorus]
Eisai sto myalo kati magiko
Otan m' akoumpas liono, liono
Eisai sto myalo kati magiko
M' ena sou fili dose pono

[Chorus]
Eisai sto myalo kati magiko
Otan m' akoumpas liono, liono
Eisai sto myalo kati magiko
M' ena sou fili dose pono

[Bridge]
Eisai sto myalo kati magiko
Eisai sto myalo kati magiko
Dose pono

[Chorus]
Eisai sto myalo kati magiko
Otan m' akoumpas liono, liono
Eisai sto myalo kati magiko
M' ena sou fili dose pono

[Outro]
Opou pas esy tha 'mai panta egoEmbed

songs.full_title: Po Po Po by Lefteris Pantazis (Ft. Konstantinos Nazis)
songs.title: Po Po Po

description.plain: With a new air full of joy, music and good mood, Lefteris Pantazis presents us with his new song. It is a duet with the very promising Konstantinos Nazis, who has been taking off with his successes lately. The song is titled “Po Po Po” and is in the music of Christodoulos Siganos and the lyrics of himself and Valentino.

songs.embed_content: Read “Po Po Po” by Lefteris Pantazis on Genius

body.plain: With a new air full of joy, music and good mood, Lefteris Pantazis presents us with his new song. It is a duet with the very promising Konstantinos Nazis, who has been taking off with his successes lately. The song is titled “Po Po Po” and is in the music of Christodoulos Siganos and the lyrics of himself and Valentino.

songs.lyrics:
Po Po Po Lyrics[Intro]
Vasaniso

[Verse 1]
Dose nazi, mi se noiazei den peirazei
Oti niotheis einai fysiologiko
Se kolazei me ton tropo pou koitazei
Se trelainei kai se paei ston Theo

[Chorus]
Po po po, po po po ti koritsi einai afto
Po po po, po po po ti koritsi na charo
Omorfa matia, omorfa cheili
Ma pano apo ola echei omorfo
Po po po, po po po, ti koritsi einai afto
[Verse 2]
To koritsi einai sketi amartia
Echeis pesei se megalo peirasmo
Akouse me sou milaei i empeiria
Echeis fygei gia ton evdomo ourano

[Chorus]
Po po po, po po po ti koritsi einai afto
Po po po, po po po ti koritsi na charo
Omorfa matia, omorfa cheili
Ma pano apo ola echei omorfo
Po po po, po po po, ti koritsi einai afto

[Bridge]
Po, po, po, po
Po, po, po, po
Po, po, po, po
Po, po, po, po

[Chorus]
Po po po, po po po ti koritsi einai afto
Po po po, po po po ti koritsi na charo
Omorfa matia, omorfa cheili
Ma pano apo ola echei omorfo
Po po po, po po po, ti koritsi einai afto
[Outro]
Po po po, po po po ti koritsi na charo
Po po po, po po po ti koritsi einai afto
Po po po, po po po ti koritsi na charoEmbed

songs.lyrics:
Agapa Me (Abrazame) Lyrics[Verse]
Agapa me
M' ola ta lathi pou 'cho kanei
Krata me
Enochos eimai apenanti sou ta pame
Ma s' agapo
Agapa me
Ginomai dromos na peraseis
Pata me
Echo ananki apo sena
Niose me, agapa me

[Chorus]
Agapa me
Giati na ziso choria sou de ginetai
Neraki i zoi mou kai tha chynetai
Stis petres dichos noima gi' afto
Agapa me
Kai xechase loipon pos parasyromai
Kai geire pali apano mou na geiroume
Agapi, mono agapi sou zito
[Verse]
Agapa me
M' ola ta lathi pou 'cho kanei
Krata me
Enochos eimai apenanti sou ta pame
Ma s' agapo
Agapa me
Ginomai dromos na peraseis
Pata me
Echo ananki apo sena
Niose me, agapa me

[Chorus]
Agapa me
Giati na ziso choria sou de ginetai
Neraki i zoi mou kai tha chynetai
Stis petres dichos noima gi' afto
Agapa me
Kai xechase loipon pos parasyromai
Kai geire pali apano mou na geiroume
Agapi, mono agapi sou zito

[Outro]
Kai geire pali apano mou na geiroume
Agapi, mono agapi sou zitoEmbed

body.plain: It is the twelfth song of the album ‘'Eleftheros Ki Oreos’‘.

songs.lyrics:
I Gineka Tis Zois Mou Lyrics[Verse 1]
De tha koimitho pia vrady, de tha koimitho
Parea tha 'cho to fengari kai ton ourano
Tha taxideveis sto kormi mou opos thes esy
Tha einai i anasa sou oli mou i zoi

[Chorus]
I gynaika tis zois mou eisai mono esy
San mia trela, san methysi apo glyko krasi
I gynaika tis zois mou echei t' onoma sou
An tha ziso, an tha pethano einai dikaioma sou

[Verse 2]
Mi grafeis pleon grammata dichos paralipti
I nychta tora kleidose tis monaxias to syrti
An theleis kati na sou po, tha sou to po ego
Sta dyo sou matia chanomai, tha sou to orkisto
[Chorus]
I gynaika tis zois mou eisai mono esy
San mia trela, san methysi apo glyko krasi
I gynaika tis zois mou echei t' onoma sou
An tha ziso, an tha pethano einai dikaioma sou

[Chorus]
I gynaika tis zois mou eisai mono esy
San mia trela, san methysi apo glyko krasi
I gynaika tis zois mou echei t' onoma sou
An tha ziso, an tha pethano einai dikaioma souEmbed

songs.full_title: Tha Choriso Kai Tha To Panigyriso! by Lefteris Pantazis
songs.title: Tha Choriso Kai Tha To Panigyriso!
songs.title_with_featured: Tha Choriso Kai Tha To Panigyriso!

description.plain: “Tha Choriso Kai Tha To Panigyriso!”, interprets Lefteris Pantazis in music by Christodoulos Siganos and lyrics by Roulis Makridis and Valentino, who will surely become the anthem of the separated. Framed by dozens of beautiful girls, Lefteris Pantazis, divorced and celebrated, under the direction of Sherif Francis, and the result is explosive.

songs.embed_content: Read “Tha Choriso Kai Tha To Panigyriso!” by Lefteris Pantazis on Genius

description_annotation.fragment: Tha Choriso Kai Tha To Panigyriso!

range.content: Tha Choriso Kai Tha To Panigyriso!

annotatable.link_title: Tha Choriso Kai Tha To Panigyriso! by Lefteris Pantazis
annotatable.title: Tha Choriso Kai Tha To Panigyriso!

body.plain: “Tha Choriso Kai Tha To Panigyriso!”, interprets Lefteris Pantazis in music by Christodoulos Siganos and lyrics by Roulis Makridis and Valentino, who will surely become the anthem of the separated. Framed by dozens of beautiful girls, Lefteris Pantazis, divorced and celebrated, under the direction of Sherif Francis, and the result is explosive.

songs.lyrics:
Tha Choriso Kai Tha To Panigyriso! Lyrics[Intro]
Five, me chalases
Four, me poulises
Three, me dielyses
Two, me pethanes
One, gia afto
Tha choriso, tha choriso kai tha to panigyriso
Tha glentao, tha ta spao, me parees tha gyrnao

[Verse 1]
Kathe sou lexi itan kai ena sou psema
Tora tha prepei na teleiono to thema
Pou me trelainei kathe ora kai kathe lepto
Gia afto, gia afto, gia afto

[Chorus]
Tha choriso, tha choriso kai tha to panigyriso
Tha glentao, tha ta spao, me parees tha gyrnao
Tha choriso, tha choriso kai tha to panigyriso
Dika sou lathi tha xechnao, tora pia se xepernao
[Verse 2]
Kathe sou lexi einai kai ena machairi
Pou simadevei stis kardias mou ta meri
Tora ti kano oso yparchei akoma kairos

[Chorus]
Tha choriso, tha choriso kai tha to panigyriso
Tha glentao, tha ta spao, me parees tha gyrnao
Tha choriso, tha choriso kai tha to panigyriso
Dika sou lathi tha xechnao, tora pia se xepernao

[Bridge]
Tha choriso, kai tha to panigyriso
Tha choriso, kai tha to panigyriso
Gia afto, gia afto, gia afto

[Outro]
Tha choriso, tha choriso kai tha to panigyriso
Dika sou lathi tha xechnao, tora pia se xepernaoEmbed

body.plain: “Eleftheros Ki Oreos” sings to our new single Lefteris Pantazis. An uplifting chiftetelli, the creation of Christodoulos Siganos and Valentino, with a verse aka, trademark of the singer.

songs.lyrics:
Eleftheros Ki Oreos Lyrics[Intro]
Me poulises, me pethanes, me tsakises
Kai tora pleon tha 'mai
Eleftheros ki oraios gia parti mou tha zo
Apopse tha amartiso kai de tha koimitho

[Verse 1]
Eisai mia gynaika dichos synaisthimata
I agapi sou gia mena tria vimata

[Pre-Chorus]
Me poulises, me pethanes, me tsakises
Kai tora pleon tha 'mai

[Chorus]
Eleftheros ki oraios gia parti mou tha zo
Apopse tha amartiso kai de tha koimitho
Eleftheros ki oraios gia parti mou tha zo
Apopse tha amartiso kai tha s' ekdikitho
[Verse 2]
Eisai mia gynaika dichos synaisthimata
Pou echei mathei sti zoi tis na echei thymata

[Pre-Chorus]
Me poulises, me pethanes, me tsakises
Kai tora pleon tha 'mai

[Chorus]
Eleftheros ki oraios gia parti mou tha zo
Apopse tha amartiso kai de tha koimitho
Eleftheros ki oraios gia parti mou tha zo
Apopse tha amartiso kai tha s' ekdikitho

[Chorus]
Eleftheros ki oraios gia parti mou tha zo
Apopse tha amartiso kai de tha koimitho
Eleftheros ki oraios gia parti mou tha zo
Apopse tha amartiso kai tha s' ekdikithoEmbed

songs.title: Vasilias

description.plain: Lefteris Pantazis presents his song in music by Stelios Chronis and lyrics by Loula Papagiannopoulou. The song is melodious and tender and speaks directly to the hearts of all lovers.

songs.embed_content: Read “Vasilias” by Lefteris Pantazis on Genius

album.full_title: Eleftheros Ki Oreos by Lefteris Pantazis
album.name: Eleftheros Ki Oreos

body.plain: Lefteris Pantazis presents his song in music by Stelios Chronis and lyrics by Loula Papagiannopoulou. The song is melodious and tender and speaks directly to the hearts of all lovers.

songs.lyrics:
Vasilias Lyrics[Verse 1]
De thymamai to onoma mou
Kai to parelthon mou
Dipla sou me noiazei
Mono to paron mou
Proskyno tin omorfia sou
Kai to apolamvano
Kai katholou de me noiazei
Posa lathi kano

[Chorus]
Otan eisai erotevmenos
Niotheis vasilias
Ola ta 'cheis pliromena
Se kanena de chrostas
Otan eisai erotevmenos
Ola ta empodia xepernas
Mia ankalia monacha ftanei
Gia na niotheis vasilias
[Verse 2]
De thymamai to onoma mou
Kai to parelthon mou
Sto diko sou prosopaki
Echo to myalo mou
Proskyno tin omorfia sou
Kai parakalao
Na yparcheis stin zoi mou
Gia na s' agapao

[Chorus]
Otan eisai erotevmenos
Niotheis vasilias
Ola ta 'cheis pliromena
Se kanena de chrostas
Otan eisai erotevmenos
Ola ta empodia xepernas
Mia ankalia monacha ftanei
Gia na niotheis vasiliasEmbed

album.name: Eleftheros Ki Oreos

body.plain: It is the eleventh song of the album ‘'Eleftheros Ki Oreos’‘.

songs.lyrics:
Se Diekdiko Lyrics[Verse 1]
Ti sou kollise kai theleis na m' ekdikitheis
Kai mou les pos kati oraio m' enan allo zeis
Ma to chioumor mou den echei
Kai ekplixeis de sou kanei
Ki an mazi mou ton synkrineis
Se polla simeia chanei

[Chorus]
Se diekdiko, den ypochoro
Ola tha ta thysiaso gia na s' echo ego
Se diekdiko os ton teliko
Nikitis kai nikimenos idia s' agapo
Se diekdiko, den ypochoro
Ola tha ta thysiaso gia na s' echo ego
Se diekdiko os ton teliko
Nikitis kai nikimenos idia s' agapo
[Verse 2]
Ti sou kollise kai theleis na katastrafo
Kai san psychiko koureli choria sou na zo
Mou 'pane pos adikeisai kai gia sena pos den kanei
Ki an mazi mou ton synkrineis
Se polla simeia chanei

[Chorus]
Se diekdiko, den ypochoro
Ola tha ta thysiaso gia na s' echo ego
Se diekdiko os ton teliko
Nikitis kai nikimenos idia s' agapo
Se diekdiko, den ypochoro
Ola tha ta thysiaso gia na s' echo ego
Se diekdiko os ton teliko
Nikitis kai nikimenos idia s' agapo

[Chorus]
Se diekdiko, den ypochoro
Ola tha ta thysiaso gia na s' echo ego
Se diekdiko os ton teliko
Nikitis kai nikimenos idia s' agapo
Se diekdiko, den ypochoro
Ola tha ta thysiaso gia na s' echo ego
Se diekdiko os ton teliko
Nikitis kai nikimenos idia s' agapo
[Outro]
Nikitis kai nikimenos idia s' agapoEmbed

body.plain: The music and lyrics of the song, just released by Heaven Music, are signed by George Mahattos, while the production was directed by Lefteris Pantazis with Christodoulos Siganos.

songs.lyrics:
Se Liga Tetragonika Lyrics[Verse 1]
Perasa exo ap' to spiti
Pou noikiazame mazi
To edinan se ena mesiti
Giati kanenas pia de zei
Mesa sto kryo ki adeio spiti
Pou tosa zisame mazi

[Chorus]
Se liga tetragonika
Filoxenithikan polla
Lypes, chares kai ankalies
Dyo somata epairnan fotia
Se liga tetragonika
Filoxenithikan polla
Ma oti chtisame mazi
Egine stachti xafnika
[Verse 2]
De to xechnao itan triti
Evreche, fysage poly
Epsachnan allon idioktiti
Choris na tous apascholei
An tha agapisei afto to spiti
Pou tosa zisame mazi

[Chorus]
Se liga tetragonika
Filoxenithikan polla
Lypes, chares kai ankalies
Dyo somata epairnan fotia
Se liga tetragonika
Filoxenithikan polla
Ma oti chtisame mazi
Egine stachti xafnika

[Chorus]
Se liga tetragonika
Filoxenithikan polla
Lypes, chares kai ankalies
Dyo somata epairnan fotia
Se liga tetragonika
Filoxenithikan polla
Ma oti chtisame mazi
Egine stachti xafnikaEmbed

body.plain: ‘'Amartolo Kormi’‘, it is second track of Eleftheros Ki Oreos album.

songs.lyrics:
Amartolo Kormi Lyrics[Chorus]
Amartolo kormi kai arrosto myalo
Thymosan theoi gia ton erota pou zo
Amartolo mou dakry, pathos dynato
Tha ti vro tin akri giati s' echo achti
Giati akoma s' agapo

[Chorus]
Amartolo kormi kai arrosto myalo
Thymosan theoi gia ton erota pou zo
Amartolo mou dakry, pathos dynato
Tha ti vro tin akri giati s' echo achti
Giati akoma s' agapo

[Verse 1]
Mati de se pianei, ola ta 'cheis kanei
Vlepo apeira trela sto flitzani
Tis zois mou alani m' echeis xetrelanei
I psychi mou telika trechei kai de ftanei
[Chorus]
Amartolo kormi kai arrosto myalo
Thymosan theoi gia ton erota pou zo
Amartolo mou dakry, pathos dynato
Tha ti vro tin akri giati s' echo achti
Giati akoma s' agapo

[Verse 2]
Kosmo den allazeis, dilitirio stazeis
Richneis akyra sychna kai dikazeis
Vlemmata moirazeis ta nera tarazeis
Ma sto telos typika olous tous adeiazeis

[Chorus]
Amartolo kormi kai arrosto myalo
Thymosan theoi gia ton erota pou zo
Amartolo mou dakry, pathos dynato
Tha ti vro tin akri giati s' echo achti
Giati akoma s' agapo

[Chorus]
Amartolo kormi kai arrosto myalo
Thymosan theoi gia ton erota pou zo
Amartolo mou dakry, pathos dynato
Tha ti vro tin akri giati s' echo achti
Giati akoma s' agapoEmbed

body.plain: It is the thirteenth song of the album ‘'Eleftheros Ki Oreos’‘.

songs.lyrics:
Mi Stamatas Lyrics[Verse 1]
Stous dromous tou ego mou
Skia kai eidolo mou
Tha eisai oso yparcho ki oso zo
Monadiki kai mia treli mou adynamia
To alfa kai to omega mou esy to s' agapo

[Pre-Chorus]
Monadiki kai mia
Treli mou adynamia

[Chorus]
Mi stamatas na mou to les
Pos m' agapas, mi stamatas
Mi stamatas opos kai chtes
Na mou milas, mi stamatas
[Verse 2]
Ta vradia sta oneira mou
Asteri tou erota mou
Tha eisai sto diko mou ourano
Panselinos, fengari, sosto margaritari
Ta panta ola matia mou esy to s' agapo

[Pre-Chorus]
Monadiki kai mia
Treli mou adynamia

[Chorus]
Mi stamatas na mou to les
Pos m' agapas, mi stamatas
Mi stamatas opos kai chtes
Na mou milas, mi stamatas

[Bridge]
Mi stamatas
Mi stamatas na mou to les

[Chorus]
Mi stamatas na mou to les
Pos m' agapas, mi stamatas
Mi stamatas opos kai chtes
Na mou milas, mi stamatas
[Post-Chorus]
Mi stamatas na mou to les
Na mou milas, mi stamatas

[Outro]
Mi stamatas
Mi stamatas
Mi stamatas na mou to les
Pos m' agapas, mi stamatasEmbed

songs.title: Mallon

description.plain: It is the seventh song of the album ‘'Eleftheros Ki Oreos’‘.

songs.embed_content: Read “Mallon” by Lefteris Pantazis on Genius

album.full_title: Eleftheros Ki Oreos by Lefteris Pantazis
album.name: Eleftheros Ki Oreos

body.plain: It is the seventh song of the album ‘'Eleftheros Ki Oreos’‘.

songs.lyrics:
Mallon Lyrics[Intro]
Esy eisai afti pou echei ftiachtei
Agapes kai oneira na katastrefeis

[Verse 1]
Tha pouliso t' amaxi, tha pouliso to spiti
Tha koimamai stous dromous ki as me lene aliti
Tha tinaxo apopse mia zoi ston aera
Kai tha vgalo ap' to cheri mou ti diki sou ti vera

[Chorus]
Mallon eisai m' allon
Afti tin ora ki ego arrostaino
Mallon eisai m' allon
Afti tin ora ki ego pethaino
Mallon eisai m' allon
Afti tin ora ki echo pagosei
Mallon eisai m' allon
Kai i zoi mou echei teleiosei
[Verse 2]
Tha petaxo ta dora pou esy mou 'cheis kanei
Tha petaxo ap' to dentro nyfiko kai stefani
Tha tinaxo apopse mia zoi ston aera
Kai kratao gia menane tin epomeni sfaira

[Chorus]
Mallon eisai m' allon
Afti tin ora ki ego arrostaino
Mallon eisai m' allon
Afti tin ora ki ego pethaino
Mallon eisai m' allon
Afti tin ora ki echo pagosei
Mallon eisai m' allon
Kai i zoi mou echei teleioseiEmbed

songs.full_title: Gia Sena Anisiho by Lefteris Pantazis
songs.title: Gia Sena Anisiho

description.plain: It is the ninth song of the album ‘'Eleftheros Ki Oreos’‘.

annotatable.link_title: Gia Sena Anisiho by Lefteris Pantazis
annotatable.title: Gia Sena Anisiho

body.plain: It is the ninth song of the album ‘'Eleftheros Ki Oreos’‘.

songs.lyrics:
Gia Sena Anisiho Lyrics[Verse 1]
Se rotisa pou pas
Kai 'sy mou apantas
De ginetai na eimaste opos prota
Pires ta kleidia sou
Machairia i matia sou
Efyges kai chtypises tin porta

[Chorus]
De fovamai gia mena
Echo antexei polla
Omos skeftomai esena
An gyriseis se mena
De tha eimai edo
Gia sena anisycho
[Verse 2]
Ta ichni sou i vrochi
Ta esvise kai ’sy
Prosperases afta pou mas enonoun
Afises simadia
Parea mou ta vradia
Afta pou se thymizoun me skotonoun

[Chorus]
De fovamai gia mena
Echo antexei polla
Omos skeftomai esena
An gyriseis se mena
De tha eimai edo
Gia sena anisycho

[Chorus]
De fovamai gia mena
Echo antexei polla
Omos skeftomai esena
An gyriseis se mena
De tha eimai edo
Gia sena anisycho

[Chorus]
De fovamai gia mena
Echo antexei polla
Omos skeftomai esena
An gyriseis se mena
De tha eimai edo
Gia sena anisychoEmbed

songs.full_title: To Parathiro Mou by Lefteris Pantazis
songs.title: To Parathiro Mou

description.plain: It is the fifteenth song of the album ‘'Eleftheros Ki Oreos’‘.

songs.embed_content: Read “To Parathiro Mou” by Lefteris Pantazis on Genius

album.full_title: Eleftheros Ki Oreos by Lefteris Pantazis
album.name: Eleftheros Ki Oreos

annotatable.link_title: To Parathiro Mou by Lefteris Pantazis
annotatable.title: To Parathiro Mou

body.plain: It is the fifteenth song of the album ‘'Eleftheros Ki Oreos’‘.

songs.lyrics:
To Parathiro Mou Lyrics[Verse 1]
As chamilosoume ta fota
Ma mi mou sviseis ti fengari
Sta matia an thes na me koitazeis
Kai na mou les pos m' agapas

[Pre-Chorus]
De thelo logia anoita
Pou avrio tha 'cheis xechasei
Sto maxilari mou na geireis
Kai na me pareis ankalia

[Chorus]
To parathyro mou vlepei mono ourano
Ach kai ligi thalassa vlepei sto theo
To parathyro mou vlepei mono ourano
[Verse 2]
Ti mousiki mi chamiloneis
Ase na krypsei tin alitheia
Varethika ta paramythia
Mono na les pos m' agapas

[Pre-Chorus]
De thelo logia anoita
Pou avrio tha 'cheis xechasei
Sto maxilari mou na geireis
Kai na me pareis ankalia

[Chorus]
To parathyro mou vlepei mono ourano
Ach kai ligi thalassa vlepei sto theo
To parathyro mou vlepei mono ouranoEmbed

songs.title: Psarades

description.plain: It is the sixth song of the album ‘'Eleftheros Ki Oreos’‘.

songs.embed_content: Read “Psarades” by Lefteris Pantazis on Genius

album.full_title: Eleftheros Ki Oreos by Lefteris Pantazis
album.name: Eleftheros Ki Oreos

body.plain: It is the sixth song of the album ‘'Eleftheros Ki Oreos’‘.

songs.lyrics:
Psarades Lyrics[Verse 1]
Och kai ti tha ginei
Kamia dekaria psarades
Eimaste kai to glentoume
Me thalassina tragoudia
Ta merakia mas xespoume

[Pre-Chorus]
Sikose kairo kai desan
Ta kaikia stin arada
Kai to glenti echei anapsei
Kai i krasopatinada

[Chorus]
Ki an pioume oli ti thalassa
Ki an ginoume oloi fesi
Etsi goustaroume emeis
Kai etsi mas aresei
Ki an pioume oli ti thalassa
Ki an ginoume oloi fesi
Etsi goustaroume emeis
Kai etsi mas aresei
[Verse 2]
Och kai poios mas pianei
Mia parea deka antres
Oloi thalassodarmenoi
Votsala ap' to Aigaio
Ki ap' ta kymata vgalmenoi

[Pre-Chorus]
Fagame me to koutali
Tis zois to meterizi
Stin agapi kai sto kyma
I kardia mas armenizei

[Chorus]
Ki an pioume oli ti thalassa
Ki an ginoume oloi fesi
Etsi goustaroume emeis
Kai etsi mas aresei
Ki an pioume oli ti thalassa
Ki an ginoume oloi fesi
Etsi goustaroume emeis
Kai etsi mas aresei

[Chorus]
Ki an pioume oli ti thalassa
Ki an ginoume oloi fesi
Etsi goustaroume emeis
Kai etsi mas aresei
Ki an pioume oli ti thalassa
Ki an ginoume oloi fesi
Etsi goustaroume emeis
Kai etsi mas areseiEmbed

songs.title: Monogamikos

description.plain: It is the fourteenth song of the album ‘'Eleftheros Ki Oreos’‘.

songs.embed_content: Read “Monogamikos” by Lefteris Pantazis on Genius

album.full_title: Eleftheros Ki Oreos by Lefteris Pantazis
album.name: Eleftheros Ki Oreos

body.plain: It is the fourteenth song of the album ‘'Eleftheros Ki Oreos’‘.

songs.lyrics:
Monogamikos Lyrics[Verse 1]
Peirasmos peirasmos eisai martys mou o Theos
Kai fotia pyrkagia ta dika sou ta filia

[Pre-Chorus]
Eisai gynaika flogovolo, me theleis schesi sovari
Desmevmenis theleis rolo, mallon echeis trelathei

[Chorus]
Den eimai monogamikos, eimai terma arsenikos
Ki an me thes gia mia zoi mallon echeis trelathei

[Verse 2]
Ieros ieros o dikos sou o choros
Kai zimia, symfora tou kormiou sou ta kryfa
[Pre-Chorus]
Eisai gynaika flogovolo, me theleis schesi sovari
Desmevmenis theleis rolo, mallon echeis trelathei

[Chorus]
Den eimai monogamikos, eimai terma arsenikos
Ki an me thes gia mia zoi mallon echeis trelathei

[Bridge]
Den eimai monogamikos, eimai terma arsenikos
Ki an me thes gia mia zoi

[Chorus]
Den eimai monogamikos, eimai terma arsenikos
Ki an me thes gia mia zoi mallon echeis trelatheiEmbed

songs.title: Ano Kato

description.plain: It is the tenth song of the album ‘'Eleftheros Ki Oreos’‘.

songs.embed_content: Read “Ano Kato” by Lefteris Pantazis on Genius

album.full_title: Eleftheros Ki Oreos by Lefteris Pantazis
album.name: Eleftheros Ki Oreos

body.plain: It is the tenth song of the album ‘'Eleftheros Ki Oreos’‘.

songs.lyrics:
Ano Kato Lyrics[Verse 1]
Tha metriso os to deka kai tha exafanisteis
Sti zoi mou san ton klefti allo de tha xanampeis
Den yparchei sotiria oute mia stis ekato
Mia vitrina isoun mono s' ena magazi keno

[Chorus]
Ano kato tha ta kano an brosta mou esy faneis
Ola anapoda tha erthoun vale stoichima an boreis
Ano kato an tolmiseis na gyriseis sta palia
I agapi pou sou eicha mas katevase rola

[Verse 2]
Eimai sigouros gia mena oti ola teleiosan
Efkairies de sou dino ta keria mas eliosan
Psemata kai alla tosa de sikono tora pia
I agapi mou gia sena teleiose oristika
[Chorus]
Ano kato tha ta kano an brosta mou esy faneis
Ola anapoda tha erthoun vale stoichima an boreis
Ano kato an tolmiseis na gyriseis sta palia
I agapi pou sou eicha mas katevase rola

[Chorus]
Ano kato tha ta kano an brosta mou esy faneis
Ola anapoda tha erthoun vale stoichima an boreis
Ano kato an tolmiseis na gyriseis sta palia
I agapi pou sou eicha mas katevase rolaEmbed

songs.title: Ine Astio
songs.embed_content: Read “Ine Astio” by Lefteris Pantazis on Genius
songs.lyrics:
Ine Astio LyricsΑν είναι ποτέ δυνατό
Χωρίσαμε δίχως να πούμε αντίο
Αν είναι ποτέ δυνατό
Να έχουμε φτάσει σ’αυτό το σημείο

Είναι αστείο εμείς οι δύο
Να μη μιλιόμαστε
Είναι αστείο εμείς οι δύο
Να σκοτωνόμαστε
Είναι αστείο εμείς οι δύο
Να μη μιλιόμαστε
Είναι αστείο εμείς οι δύο
Που λατρευόμαστε

Αν είναι ποτέ δυνατό
Εσύ που πέθαινες από αγάπη
Για μένα
Αν είναι ποτέ δυνατό
Εγώ που έδινα τη ζωή μου
Για σένα
Είναι αστείο εμείς οι δύο
Να μη μιλιόμαστε
Είναι αστείο εμείς οι δύο
Να σκοτωνόμαστε
Είναι αστείο εμείς οι δύο
Να μη μιλιόμαστε
Είναι αστείο εμείς οι δύο
Που λατρευόμαστεEmbed
